Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hlgut-defensin (H. longicornis midgut defensin; Ticks, Arthropods, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=5-25 mg/mL);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=10-25 mg/mL).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Both Hlgut-defensin and Hlsal-defensin sequences have antibactrrial activity against a variety of Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: Sequence characterization and expression patterns of two defensin-like antimicrobial peptides from the tick Haemaphysalis longicornis.
Literature.Author: Zhou J, Liao M, Ueda M, Gong H, Xuan X, Fujisaki K.
